actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to direct the release of all right, title, and interest of the United States in and to, and all restrictions, conditions, and limitations on the use or conveyance of, certain real property located in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to release all Federal right, title, and interest in specified real property located in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma.

titles.title: A bill to direct the release of all right, title, and interest of the United States in and to, and all restrictions, conditions, and limitations on the use or conveyance of, certain real property located in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma, and for other purposes.
